plot outline: Nill is a spoil college student who consider himself a Casanova. He spends most of his time on Facebook with different girls although he has a steady girlfriend. One day, he is trapped by a girl who works for a gang and they shoot him in a porn film. When the video releases on a porn site, all friends his start avoiding him. The film is based on the porn film industry and how innocent people get trapped in it.
title: Not a Dirty Film
